title: torch.cat mismatched Tensor types --> Wrong error message
body_html:
Claim:
When I cat a FloatTensor with a LongTensor, PyTorch says it got a list, but it should say it got a LongTensor. The same is true for any mismatched Tensor types.

Code:

import torch
torch.cat([torch.FloatTensor(), torch.LongTensor()])

Error message:

TypeError: cat received an invalid combination of arguments - got (list), but expected one of:
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq)
      didn't match because some of the arguments have invalid types: (list)
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq, int dim)

Expected error message:

TypeError: cat received an invalid combination of arguments - got (torch.LongTensor), but expected one of:
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq)
      didn't match because some of the arguments have invalid types: (torch.LongTensor)
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq, int dim)

Environment:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 on Docker and host
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.0.post4
  • How you installed PyTorch: conda
  • Python version: 3.6.3

body:
**Claim:**
When I cat a FloatTensor with a LongTensor, PyTorch says it got a list, but it should say it got a LongTensor. The same is true for any mismatched Tensor types.

**Code:**
```python
import torch
torch.cat([torch.FloatTensor(), torch.LongTensor()])
```

**Error message:**

```python
TypeError: cat received an invalid combination of arguments - got (list), but expected one of:
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq)
      didn't match because some of the arguments have invalid types: (list)
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq, int dim)
```

**Expected error message:**

```python
TypeError: cat received an invalid combination of arguments - got (torch.LongTensor), but expected one of:
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq)
      didn't match because some of the arguments have invalid types: (torch.LongTensor)
 * (sequence[torch.FloatTensor] seq, int dim)
```

**Environment:**
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04 on Docker and host
- PyTorch version: 0.3.0.post4
- How you installed PyTorch: conda
- Python version: 3.6.3
